title: Available Services
intro: We offer a hosting platform for your architectural projects where you can find all the projects you're involved in.
softwareText: When you select a project, you'll find each room with all the necessary attributes, such as doors, partitions, finishes, and more. Each element of a project includes a comment space so clients can leave feedback. To ensure secure access, only organization administrators can invite people to a project.
deploymentText: We deploy, connect, and align with your manufacturing/logistics stack.
advisoryText: Blueprints, processes, and governance for operations at scale.
systemsText: APIs and data pipelines that make architecture and logistics talk.
